title: University of Texas Researchers Develop Innovative VR EEG Headset to Measure Brain Activity
description: Researchers at The University of Texas at Austin have made a groundbreaking advancement in virtual reality (VR) technology by developing a modified VR headset to measure brain activity. The noninvasive electroencephalogram (EEG) sensor, integrated into a Meta VR headset, allows for a comfortable and extended immersive experience. By measuring the brain’s electrical activity during VR ... Read more

title: Chinese regulators reaffirm ‘severe crackdown’ on overseas telecoms dealing in crypto, blockchain
description: China is warning telecom companies that are based overseas not to wield “new technologies” — digital assets, blockchain, artificial intelligence (AI) and the metaverse — for nefarious purposes. According to Global Times, citing a statement from the Chinese Central Political…
